SEARCH

Class LibrarianControllerTest

java.lang.Object
LibrarianControllerTest
public class LibrarianControllerTest extends Object
Comprehensive Integration Test Suite for the LibrarianController class.

This suite utilizes Java Reflection to access and verify private fields and methods, ensuring high code coverage and robust validation of the Librarian Dashboard logic. It handles JavaFX thread synchronization and file I/O operations for realistic testing scenarios.

Version:
2.0
Author:
Zainab

  • Method Details

    • initToolkit

      @BeforeAll static void initToolkit()
      Initializes the JavaFX Toolkit required for testing UI components. This method ensures the toolkit is started only once for the entire test suite.

    • setUp

      @BeforeEach void setUp() throws Exception
      Sets up the test environment before each test case. Initializes the controller and cleans up any residual test files.
      Throws:
      Exception - if reflection or file operations fail.

    • tearDown

      @AfterEach void tearDown()
      Cleans up test resources after each test execution.
